title: Kansas City University
description: The Kansas City Universrty's Catalog and Student Handbook provides students with academic calendars, course descriptions, student policies, as well as student services and financial aid information.
cleaned_text: | | | 2023-2024 University Catalog & Student Handbook | 2023-2024 University Catalog & Student Handbook | | This catalog and student handbook is an official bulletin of Kansas City University (KCU) and is intended to provide general information. The document contains policies, regulations, procedures and fees effective July 1, 2023. The University reserves the right to make changes at any time to reflect current board policies, administrative regulations and procedures, amendments by state law and fee changes. Information provided in this document is subject to change without notice and does not constitute a contract between KCU and a student or an applicant for admission. The institution is not responsible for any misrepresentation or provisions that may arise as a result of errors in preparation. Students are responsible for observing any policies or regulations contained herein or in the online policy library; therefore, they must read this document carefully. This document does not contain all institutional rules, regulations or policies for which students are responsible. Other University sources discuss expectations for and policies applicable to students; students are required to review policies published by their program of study and the University's Intranet-based policy library. The current electronic copies of these publications, as well as other University policies, can be obtained at the University's [intranet-based policy library](https://mykcu.kansascity.edu/policies). Note: Printed versions may not be current; the electronic version will always be current. Contact Information KCU-Kansas City 1750 Independence Avenue Kansas City, 816.654.7215 Student Accounts 816.654.7080 [studentaccounts@kansascity.edu](mailto:studentaccounts@kansascity.edu) Administrative offices are open weekdays from 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Visitors are strongly encouraged to make appointments before visiting the campus to ensure the availability of the person they would like to see. © 2023 Kansas City University Published July 1, 2023.
